General.Name: Mazarin Inc
General.Description: Mazarin Inc. manages various mining properties in Canada. It also owns and rents mining buildings that can be used as warehouses or plants; sells land and mining equipment; and sells royalties from the exploitation of a granite quarry, as well as engages in the real estate development business. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Thetford Mines, Canada.
General.Address: 696, Monfette Street East, Thetford Mines, QC, Canada, G6G 7G9
